attributes.action: not introduce motorbike speed limiters (Intelligent Speed Adaptation )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Identify other safer and viable options in the approach to reducing motorcycle accident rates.  Engage and consult with motorcyclists/motorcycle industry/training schools on best possible options and not to consider ill advised and ill informed radical action like that of Intelligent Speed Adaptation (Speed Limiters).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
